CFO Services

For businesses to achieve sustainable growth in today’s dynamic business ecosystem, it becomes crucial to make effective and strategic financial decisions in a timely manner. While businesses are facing more complex financial decisions, having senior-level expertise to guide them through the path becomes significant to achieve growth. Looking to minimize expenditure, hiring a full-time CFO is not feasible for the majority of the organizations and there comes outsourced CFO services into play. Leveraging outsourced CFO services help you gain access to all the benefits of having a CFO on-board at a portion of the cost.

Whether you are looking for a finance leader to provide advisory or interim CFO services or robust support for financial transformation, KiRi Accounting can do it all for you. With our dedicated team of seasoned accounting and finance experts working harmoniously, we provide comprehensive insights and analysis that ensure timely decision making. Our team will take complete charge of your finance and accounting function and work in close contact with your CEO, investors, Group CFO, or company’s finance and accounts team to provide actions and results that are aligned with your business’ evolving needs for achieving awestruck growth.

What do we serve?

  • Cash Flow Projection
  • Revenue Forecasting
  • Expense Budgeting
  • Business Snapshot with Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
  • Data Analytics and Portal Services – Client/Industry Specific
  • High Level Management Reports – Product Profitability, Break even Analysis, “What If” Scenarios
  • Assisting Full Time CFOs by doing number crunching and providing relevant information for timely decision making
